remarks: Lemma for ~ lgsdir2 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lgsdir2lem2.1 $e |- ( K e. ZZ /\ 2 || ( K + 1 ) /\ ( ( A e. ZZ /\ -. 2 || A ) -> ( ( A mod 8 ) e. ( 0 ... K ) -> ( A mod 8 ) e. S ) ) ) $.
lgsdir2lem2.2 $e |- M = ( K + 1 ) $.
lgsdir2lem2.3 $e |- N = ( M + 1 ) $.
lgsdir2lem2.4 $e |- N e. S $.
lgsdir2lem2 $p |- ( N e. ZZ /\ 2 || ( N + 1 ) /\ ( ( A e. ZZ /\ -. 2 || A ) -> ( ( A mod 8 ) e. ( 0 ... N ) -> ( A mod 8 ) e. S ) ) ) $.
